name: Grilly Restaurant Website
description: The Grilli project is a fully responsive and modern website designed for a restaurant, focusing on clean and engaging design. I developed the layout using CSS Grid and Flexbox, ensuring optimal performance and a seamless experience across various screen sizes. The website includes an attractive homepage that features visually appealing restaurant images, a dynamic menu, and customer reviews. I implemented JavaScript to add interactive components such as image sliders and smooth transitions, enhancing user engagement and providing a polished browsing experience.
